ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] reason for guise of the deceiver to come off?
ygData.msgSnippet: i know it comes from a rare in Trakanon who casts heavily.  it also does not give iksar regen, and no platemail shows up on iksar s =/  i still want it though
ygData.messageBody:
i know it comes from a rare in Trakanon who casts heavily. it also does not
give iksar regen, and no platemail shows up on iksar's =/ i still want it
though hehe. but without platemail lokos i don't want it all that bad. so
your question is a good one, what does being an iksar do for you other than
maybe a little faction and just for fun. do they have ultravision? that's
why i use my current guise, and i use it a lot in kunark, always seems to be
dark.

Shada Powa, L52 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> this comes from Trakanon i hear:
>
> Iksar Hide Mask
> MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM
> AC: 4
> CHA: +13 SV MAGIC: +7
> Effect: Illusion: Iksar
> WT: 0.4
> Class: BRD ROG
> Race: ALL
>
> anyone know more about this?
